text: yeung ban kttra aoy mou sa nowknong kompir ta v rt krob avei teangoasa chea kar tounmean ning chea kar bamphlu nouv avei teangnoh . hetonih chaur anak ttuol yk vea( kompir ta v rt) daoy khchabkhchuon haey chaur anak bangkeabbanhchea krom robsa anak aoy puokke ttuol yk vea daoy brasaer bamphot . yeung nung bangheanh dl puok anak nouv kanleng robsa puok chonolmeusa
